name: Favorite dress up
description:
Favorite dress up. A game for girls is a new look at the bored standard dress up games. Are you bored just changing your character? Not enough opportunities? Want some diversity? Our game will give you all this. First you need to create your character, choose a unique appearance settings. Now everything is in your hands! Change your appearance, buy the most fashionable clothes, make the most stylish hairstyles, buy houses and villas that will match your status, meet the most fashionable guys!
The game has two main indicators: money and popularity. Money will allow you to buy new homes, fashionable clothes and shoes, change hairstyles. Making purchases, you increase your popularity. With the growth of popularity you will be able to meet with the guys, the higher the popularity, the more fashionable guys will turn their attention to you. Having saved money, you can arrange a fashion show. Fashion show will bring you a large number of points of popularity.
For making money in the game there are mini-games: Intuition and Collector. In the game of intuition, you bet and guess the hidden crystal, if you guessed your money doubled, if you lose, you lose the set amount. The bigger the bet, the harder it is to guess the correct crystal and the greater the gain. The game collector will require you to the maximum care and speed. Choose a given crystal and go to the next level. Gradually, the complexity will increase, and time to conceal. Choosing the right crystal will give you extra time. When time runs out or you make a mistake, the game will end. In the end you will receive a reward, the further you go, the more money you will earn.
At your disposal will be a large selection of clothing, shoes, hairstyles and housing. Create your own unique look, raise your popularity and immediately spot the beauty of the most sophisticated guys!

Features:
- the ability to create your character
- large selection of clothes
- large selection of shoes
- large selection of hairstyles, any colors
- the ability to change housing
- the opportunity to meet with guys
- detailed statistics about your character
- mini games
- unique design
